title: Carrot and radish rice salad with tofu dressing
ingredients: ['200 g (7 oz) long-grain brown rice', '125 g (4½ oz) radishes, sliced', '1 large carrot, cut into matchsticks', '2 spring onions, chopped', '1 Asian pear, peeled, cored and diced', '55 g (2 oz) raisins', '4 tbsp coarsely chopped fresh coriander', 'Tofu dressing', '125 g (4½ oz) tofu, diced', '2 tsp Dijon mustard', '1 tbsp white wine vinegar', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '3 tbsp orange juice', 'salt and pepper']
